Articles.Content:
I've just discovered how awesome BDArmory is and I have heard of fabled "communities" of people who will design planes to fight each other. Problem though: I can't find them. The Forum's search feature is either not very good or I can't use it correctly. Where are these BDArmory players? I wish to join in the fun XD.

Edited October 14, 2022 by afyber

As I recall correctly one of them that I have heard of is Jimmy's Aerospace Emporium and its Fighter Jet Roundtable events, and I have heard they have a pretty active community as well, though if anyone else has more groups feel free to add as well!

Most BDA competitions are organized off-forum these days. FJR and Son of Smith are probably the biggest ones. Scott Manley also hosts the Runway Project through his Twitch channel sometimes. His tends to have more goofy gimmicks for the lulz, while the other two are more straight-ahead air combat. I can send Discord invites if you PM me. I'm not really active in BDA lately, but I'm still on the Discords.
